title: Getting frame loss (looks like stop animation in game) immediately following icon update
body:
ive searched a little bit on the boards to see if anyone else posted on this subject and could not find anything yet.

So I am Getting frame loss (looks like stop animation in game) immediately following icon update, i did the update this morning and the very first game i played looked sooooo choppy like i was watching stop animation, i rebooted my pc to see if that would help and it doesnt, im running as admin that doesnt help either. Any Ideas please????????

replies.body:
Yep, I got that too.

Try turning off vertical sync - that fixed it for me.

Vertical sync is located in-game (hit ESC) under the **VIDEO** settings. If this doesn't resolve the issue, this is likely linked to any number of driver or power settings that can directly impact your framerate. Working through our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) would be a good next step if you weren't able to fix it with Vsync. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
